title: 权限组问题
author: quqibing
txt_content: 创建了 权限组 jc  想让jc担当 builder的权限 但是成功后 jc还是没有普通玩家破坏方块 和翻箱子一系列问题 如何处理

replies.author: Lucky777777
replies.txt_content:
/mangaddp jc essentials.build
    /mangaddp jc essentials.tpa
      /mangaddp jc essentials.spawn
 tp等指令权限替换上面essentials.xx即可

replies.author: jiuerd
replies.txt_content:
是不是继承命令写反了
mangaddi jc builder

replies.author: mixturebbq
replies.txt_content:
mangaddi jc builder更快
让jc组继承builder所有权限

replies.author: quqibing
replies.txt_content:
Lucky777777 发表于 2014-5-5 06:43
/mangaddp jc essentials.build
    /mangaddp jc essentials.tpa
      /mangaddp jc essentials.spawn
开箱子权限呢

replies.author: Lucky777777
replies.txt_content:
quqibing 发表于 2014-5-5 12:40
开箱子权限呢
  Lockette插件？
  试试/mangaddp jc lockette.admin

replies.author: kivv
replies.txt_content:
/mangaddp jc essentials.build
    /mangaddp jc essentials.tpa
      /mangaddp jc essentials.spawn
tp等指令权限替换上面essentials.xx即可
